name: [Group03]OCTOPI IN SPACE
description:
Battle your friends in this fun party game for 2 to 4 players as the great Space Snake is awaiting a token of your worship: Dodge the falling tiles, feed the snake with hamster balls and hinder your enemies by pummelling them with weaponised balls!

Will the cute Team Feed manage to feed the powerful Space Snake so much it’ll explode and birth a new galaxy? - Or will the evil Team Poison destroy our world as we know it by poisoning the snake?

Join the action-packed adventure now: The destiny of the universe is in your tentacles!

Supports controllers only.
